## ðŸ“¦ Stack

- **Frontend:** React
- **Backend:** Node.js + Express
- **Database:** MongoDB
- **AI Engine:** OpenAI (for SOAP Summary)

- **Hosting:** Vercel (frontend) + Render (backend)
